name: Raekor's Striders
flavorText: Loren of the Samaurenian famously said he would crush the barbarians beneath his boots. Raekor took great delight in ripping them from his cold, dead feet. Forever after, they were a symbol of Raekor's greatest triumph.
flavorTextHtml: Loren of the Samaurenian famously said he would crush the barbarians beneath his boots. Raekor took great delight in ripping them from his cold, dead feet. Forever after, they were a symbol of Raekor's greatest triumph.
setDescription:
(2) Set:     
 Furious Charge refunds a charge if it hits only 1 enemy.(4) Set:     
 Furious Charge gains the effect of every rune and deals 1000% increased damage.(6) Set:     
 Every use of Furious Charge increases the damage of your next Fury-spending attack by 5500%. This effect stacks. Every use of a Fury-spending attack consumes up to 5 stacks.
setDescriptionHtml:
(2) Set:
Furious Charge refunds a charge if it hits only 1 enemy.
(4) Set:
Furious Charge gains the effect of every rune and deals 1000% increased damage.
(6) Set:
Every use of Furious Charge increases the damage of your next Fury-spending attack by 5500%. This effect stacks. Every use of a Fury-spending attack consumes up to 5 stacks.
